# WAError.NoPairedDevicesDetails

**Structure**

The optional details describing the lack of paired devices.

## Declaration

```swift
struct NoPairedDevicesDetails
```

## Checking if paired devices are present or specified

- **WAError.noPairedDevices(_:)**: An error that occurs if your app doesn’t have access to any paired devices.

## Conforms To

- Decodable
- Encodable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
